item.title: Software Engineering at Google
item.description: If there was one book this year that it was hard to avoid hearing about, it was “Software Engineering at Google”. As such, it was only a matter of time before I jumped on the bandwagon and decided to give it a read, but I’m happy I finally did! I track my highlights and notes through my kindle / goodreads, and ended up with about 80 of them. In this blogpost, I’ll just go over some of what that I thought stood out in the book in one way or another.
